A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall (p : list (A * list bool)) (a : A) (l : list bool) (b : bool), In (a, l) p -> find_code a (map (fun v : A * list bool => let (a1, b1) := v in (a1, b :: b1)) p) = b :: find_code a p

map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
find_code = fix find_code (a : A) (l : code) {struct l} : list bool := match l with | nil => nil | (b, c) :: l1 => if eqA_dec a b then c else find_code a l1 end : A -> code -> list bool

Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename

add_frequency_list_in_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 : nat) (l : list (A * nat)), In (a1, b1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a2 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ In (a1, b1) l
find_code_correct1 : forall (c : code) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
not_in_find_code : forall (a : A) (l : list (A * list bool)), (forall p : list bool, ~ In (a, p) l) -> find_code a l = nil
add_frequency_list_not_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a b : A) (n : nat), a <> b -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec b m)
add_frequency_list_1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), (forall ca : nat, ~ In (a, ca) l) -> In (a, 1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
in_frequency_map_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l)) -> In a l
add_frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list (A * nat) -> list (A * nat)
add_frequency_list_unique_key : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), unique_key l -> unique_key (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?f : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- list ?A]

add_frequency_list_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a : A) (n : nat), unique_key m -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, S n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a m)

permutation_swap : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)

```intros p a l b Hin. induction p as [| (x,y) p' IHp].
- simpl. intros. destruct Hin.
- simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a x) eqn:H.
  + simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity.
  + apply IHp.
    * destruct Hin; [congruence | assumption].
    * exact H.```
